channel.title: Bank changes
channel.description:
I like rscr's banking system. So I figured I'd make a copy. (no notes added yet)
[youtube]http://youtu.be/KafhN8AyWO4[/youtube]
Nothing too fancy, but just playing around with things.

item.description:

item.title: Bank changes
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

[quote=“freaky5000, post:7, topic:551125”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=670040.msg4480598#msg4480598 date=1429396062]
The bank screen could and should be so much better. I also think players should have the ability to view their bank without actually being at the bank.
[/quote]

Didn’t that use to be a thing? Or was it a perk of bots in the real rsc?[/quote]

no. and i never botted rsc so i wouldn’t know of the bot perks. When i started, you could only deposit coins in banks. They do need an upgrade though.

Read full topic

item.title: Bank changes
item.dc:creator: @CamHart CamHart
item.description:
@CamHart wrote:

freaky5000:

Go for it, not technically copying if you code it yourself xD

I’m pretty sure RSCR has seperate item id’s for their notes because not every item has a note. I think the approach I would look into would be simply attaching a boolean value to each item (completely ignored for items that are stackable already). That boolean would determine if the item was a real item or a note. And they can only be exchanged through the banking process.

Read full topic

item.title: Bank changes
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Theres is a bit glitchy when withdrawing notes, you need two spaces available if you try withdraw more than 1 note when only 1 space available you can only withdraw 1 note, two spaces available you can withdraw as many notes as you want. It’s ok but takes away half your bank if you are a hoarder like myself.

Read full topic
